abstract: The Tappan Zee Bridge, long overdue for an overhaul, is one of 14 projects chosen for expedited federal review and approval, possibly allowing work on a replacement bridge to begin as early as next year.
snippet: The Tappan Zee Bridge, long overdue for an overhaul, is one of 14 projects chosen for expedited federal review and approval, possibly allowing work on a replacement bridge to begin as early as next year.

headline.main: Tappan Zee Bridge Project Gets Fast-Tracked
